fields.title: Domain
fields.description: The domain the test should be performed in.

fields.title: Subject
fields.description: The subject of this filter test.

fields.title: Test
fields.description: The name of the test to apply.

fields.title: Value
fields.description: The value being compared with the test.

description: A single filter condition used to test entity or world properties. Filters check things like biome type, weather, time of day, or entity attributes. Multiple filters can be combined with all_of, any_of, and none_of operators.
